department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking the replacement of radar antennas for VTMS systems at multiple locations.
description: The phase 2 solicitation follows an invitation to qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid. Service will include Telecommunication transmission tower construction service, Electrical system services, and specialized communication system services.

full_summary:
**Phase 2 F1701-22101: VTMS Radar Antenna Replacements #
==============================================

**Government of Canada Solicitation Announcement #
=============================================

**Reference Number**: WS3814160032
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Publication Date**: January 24, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2023, at 14:00 EST
**Tender Status**: Expiring

**Background #
------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Invitation to Qualify to select contractors for the VTMS Radar Antenna Replacements project. This project is part of Phase 2 of F1701-22101.

**Procurement Details #
-------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Contract Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Selective Tendering
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

**Solicitation Overview #
----------------------

The successful contractor selected through this Invitation to Qualify will be required to provide radar antenna replacement services for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The services involve providing specialized communication system solutions to support the effective operation of radar systems.

**Contracting Entity #
-------------------

The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

**Points of Contact #
-------------------

*   **Director, Contracting Authority**: Simon Leung, PSPC
    *   Email: [simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   Telephone: *Note: Not provided*

**Requirements #
---------------

The selected contractor must be able to demonstrate the following capabilities:

*   Provide radar antenna replacement services that meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation.
*   Achieve the desired quality and reliability standards.
*   Deliver the services within the agreed-upon timelines.

**Solicitation Documents #
---------------------

This Invitation to Qualify and its attachments can be accessed at the tender website or by contacting the contracting authority. All interested contractors are required to register on the procurement system to access the solicitation documents.

**Closing #
----------

This Invitation to Qualify will expire on February 8, 2023, at
